youths <S%H3206><s%> in whom was no blemish <S%H3971><s%>, but well <S%H2896><s%> - favored <S%H4758><s%>, and skilful <S%H7919><s%> in all wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and endued <S%H3045><s%> with knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, and understanding <S%H995><s%> science <S%H4093><s%>, and such as had ability <S%H3581><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s palace <S%H1964><s%>; and that he should teach <S%H3925><s%> them the learning <S%H5612><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>.

Now among these were <S%H1121><s%>, of the children of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>.

Now God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> to find kindness <S%H2617><s%> and compassion <S%H7356><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%>.

And the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, I fear <S%H3373><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, who hath appointed <S%H4487><s%> your food <S%H3978><s%> and your drink <S%H4960><s%>: for why should he see <S%H7200><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> worse looking <S%H7200><s%> than the youths <S%H3206><s%> that are of your own age <S%H1524><s%>? so would ye endanger <S%H2325><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> to the steward <S%H4453><s%> whom the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> had appointed <S%H4487><s%> over Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>:

Prove <S%H5254><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, I beseech thee <S%H6235><s%>, ten days <S%H3117><s%>; and let them give <S%H5414><s%> us pulse <S%H2235><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, and water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.

Now as for these four <S%H702><s%> youths <S%H3206><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them knowledge <S%H4093><s%> and skill <S%H7919><s%> in all learning <S%H5612><s%> and wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: and Daniel <S%H1840><s%> had understanding <S%H995><s%> in all visions <S%H2377><s%> and dreams <S%H2472><s%>.

And at the end <S%H7117><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> which the king <S%H4428><s%> had appointed <S%H559><s%> for bringing <S%H935><s%> them in <S%H8269><s%>, the prince of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> them in before <S%H6440><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> communed <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H4672><s%>; and among them all was found none like Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>: therefore stood <S%H5975><s%> they before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.
